description: OMIP merges the CORE-II (Coordinated Ocean-Ice Reference Experiments) and OCMIP (Ocean-Carbon Cycle Model Inter-comparison Project) projects. OMIP coordinates CMIP6 ocean diagnostics for all CMIP6 simulations that include an ocean component. OMIP provides a protocol for ocean/sea-ice simulations.
label: OMIP
rationale: Providing a framework for evaluating, understanding, and improving ocean, sea ice, and biogeochemical, including inert tracers, components of climate and Earth system models contributing to CMIP6. Protocols are provided to perform coordinated ocean/sea ice/tracer/biogeochemistry simulations forced with common atmospheric data sets.
